title: Zaggonaut
desc: A retro-inspired theme for Astro, built using TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and of course, Astro.
article:
Zaggonaut

A retro-inspired theme for Astro, built using TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and of course, Astro.

Features

  • Dark & light mode
  • Customizable colors
  • 100 / 100 Lighthouse score
  • Fully accessible
  • Fully responsive
  • Type-safe
  • SEO-friendly
